text.quote: 000: Clause 1, page 1, line 8, leave out from first “persons” to “and” on line 9, and insert “whose travel on official business has the approval of Her Majesty the Queen,”
000: Clause 2, page 2, line 5, leave out subsections (3) and (4)
000: Clause 3, lord Cormack gives notice of his intention to oppose the Question that Clause 3 stand part of the Bill.
